text.tspan: Per capita COâ‚‚ emissions vs. per capita energy consumption, 2021
Emissions include fossil fuel and industry emissions. Land use change is not included.
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2022); Gapminder (2022); UN (2022); HYDE (2017); Gapminder (Systema Globalis), U.S. Energy
Information Administration (EIA); Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy (2023)
